messages.msgSnippet: Are you using Internet Explorer? if so, the reason why you can t download things is because your browser is corrupt (probably) For that you d have to reinstall
messages.messageBody:
Are you using Internet Explorer? if so, the reason why you can't download
things is because your browser is corrupt (probably)
For that you'd have to reinstall it.

Lemme know if you need more info.



Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."

messages.subject: OT: sigh . . .
messages.msgSnippet: seriously, I don t know if it s my computer or my browser, but I have tried everything and I still can t download from Grace s or Tiffany s account.  I only
messages.messageBody:
seriously, I don't know if it's my computer or my browser, but I have tried everything and I still can't download from Grace's or Tiffany's account. I only downloaded one volume of your mangas, Grace, then it wouldn't work anymore. I even tried cleaning out everything including my Temporary Internet files/cookies and history . . . I give up!!!!!!! *kicks computer* anyways. . . yeah . . . thankx for listening to me rant . . . I hope there's a computer genius somewhere in this group who can help me *looks around hopefully* Please?


Saitoh Worship
~Anime Mystique~
